component.name: Fly Command Processor
component.description: Processes commands for core system functions, such as run:, info:, and others.

component.name: Fly Dialogs

component.name: Fly Dialogs
component.description: [DEPRECATED] Displays message dialogs, input dialogs, and confirm dialogs called using system functions.

component.name: Fly Dialogs
component.description: Displays dialogs called using system functions.

component.name: On-The-Fly Document Renderer
component.description: [DEPRECATED] Used to render documents created on-the-fly for a window page source.

component.name: External Window Host
component.description: Used to display a window to an external single-window system.

component.name: Fly Jump Menu
component.description: Loads user preferences and applications on the computer for display in the Jump menu.

component.name: Fly Logon Services
component.description: Displays login dialog window when system is turned on or user logs out.

component.name: Fly Security Confirmation
component.description: Used to get confirmation from user before performing a specified action.

component.name: Fly Shell
component.description: Handles desktop functions such as showing dialogs and notifications.

component.name: Fly Shell Sound
component.description: Extension to Fly Shell - enables system and applications to play user-specified sounds for events.

component.name: System Check
component.description: Validates system connectivity during use.

component.name: Fly Theme Loader
component.description: [DEPRECATED] Loads system theme assets for use on desktop and in applications.

component.name: Fly Theme Loader
component.description: [DEPRECATED] Loads user-specified theme assets for use on desktop and in applications.

component.name: Fly Theme Loader
component.description: Loads user- and system-specified theme assets for use on the desktop and in applications.

component.name: Fly Desktop User Interface
component.description: Loads desktop UI elements such as toolbar, Jump menu, and desktop icons.

component.name: Fly Window Manager
component.description: [DEPRECATED] Manages windows and open applications.

component.name: Fly Window Manager
component.description: [DEPRECATED] Manages windows, open applications, and background processes with tasks.

component.name: Fly Window Manager
component.description: Manages windows, open applications, and background processes with tasks.

component.name: Components List
component.description: List of all installed components with names, versions, and descriptions.

component.name: Fly Out-Of-Box Experience
component.description: Guides you through the setup of your new Fly computer.

component.name: Fly Resource Locations
component.description: Provides the system with the locations of essential system files.

component.name: Protected System Files
component.description: Provides the system with a list of system files that are protected.

component.name: File Types Index
component.description: Provides the system with information about file types including icons, descriptions, and actions.

component.name: File Types Compatibility
component.description: Provides a compatibility layer between types.json and System.FileTypes.xml, two different versions of storing the file types index.
